name: Schumacher Electric 12V Battery for Ride on Toys - TB4 12V 12 Amp Hours with Replaceable Fuse - Rechargeable 12V Ride On Replacement Battery for Peg Perego Vehicles - Safe & Easy to Use
short_description: Works with Power Wheels - The Charge 'n Ride TB4 12 volt battery for ride on toys is designed to work with 12V Peg Perego vehicles.

Quick-Connect Harness - The TB4 12v battery for ride on toys is easy to use and can be installed and connected in seconds. Replacing old batteries with our premium products can help ride-on toys last longer, and keeping an extra toy car battery on hand can help your kids get back on the road faster.
Fast Charging - For best results, use the Schumacher Charge ‘n Ride Schumacher CR6 3A 6V/12V Universal Battery Charger to quickly recharge the TB4 12v ride on replacement battery.
Replaceable Fuse - A replaceable fuse in the Charge ‘n Ride TB4 Rechargeable Replacement Battery protects against over current, for safer operation and charging
In the Box - With your purchase, you will receive the Schumacher Electric Charge ‘n Ride TB4 12-Volt kid car battery replacement and its designated user manual.
product_description: A kid with a ride-on toy will happily drive around the yard until their battery gives out. Keep the fun going longer by keeping an extra battery on hand for your child's favorite 12v battery ride on toys. The Schumacher Charge ‘n Ride TB4 12-Volt Rechargeable Replacement Battery gets budding car fanatics road-ready in no time. Installation is a breeze, and adults can easily install and connect the TB4 in seconds. The 12 Amp Hours TB4 is designed to run Peg Perego 12-volt ride-on toys. This replacement battery can be recharged using the Power Wheels supplied charger. However, for best results, use the Schumacher CR6 3A 6V/12V Universal Battery Charger. For added safety, this sealed, AGM lead acid battery also has a replaceable fuse protects against overcurrent, for added safety during charging and operation. Meanwhile, a built-in handle makes it easier to tote this battery around your garage. So if you've been searching for a premium replacement battery for your child's 12 volt Peg Perego ride on toys, consider shopping Schumacher to find out why countless parents have already grown to love us.

short_description: FITS VARIOUS MODELS: Upgraded replacement battery for Kids John Deere tractor, Case, Gaucho, and Gator ride-on toys. This 12v battery for ride on toys provides longer playtime. Ensure your child's vehicle runs smoothly without interruptions.

UP TO 85% LONGER RIDE TIME: This 12 volt 15 amp Peg Perego battery replacement gives significantly more fun time compared to the original battery. It's an excellent ride on car battery upgrade, offering extended play and fewer recharges for continuous enjoyment.

IMPROVED IN-LINE SAFETY FUSE: Easy access and enhanced protection make this fuse a great addition to your 12 volt battery for ride on toys. It ensures a safe experience, providing better security for your child's ride-on vehicle.

ARRIVES FULLY ASSEMBLED AND CHARGED: Ready to use right out of the box, this 12v battery for ride on toys is perfect for busy parents. No assembly or initial charging required, making it convenient and hassle-free for immediate playtime.

IDENTIFIED BY MULTIPLE MODELS: Original and replacement batteries include models RT12120, CF12V12-T, IAKB0501, IAKB0014, DJW12-8HD, DJW12-12HD, DMU 12-12, 2606FR, NP12-12. Note that the 15Ah battery is physically larger than the 7, 8, or 9Ah batteries and the same size as the 12V 12Ah. All Peg Perego 12V toys can accommodate both sizes.

Safe, Reliable Power: Our 12V 15Ah battery replacement ensures up to 85% longer playtime for John Deere, Gator, and Gaucho ride-on toys made by Peg Perego. With easy installation and an improved in-line safety fuse, it provides a safer, fun experience with fewer interruptions and longer-lasting power.
